website_summaries.verdict: An ice axe that delivers quickly and will work for a variety of mountaineering situations.
pros: Comes with a leash and carabiner holes on both ends to make it easy to carry
A good axe for the money
Leash designed to slide to comfort spot for carry
cons: This product only comes in a 65-centimeter length, which may or may not work for shorter or taller people

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality for price. Good wrist strap.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Planning to use this for self arrest when going across snow banks. Great quality for the price. Sturdy wrist strap. Plans for Colorado. Will update after use.
customer_reviews.author: AMaes

customer_reviews.title: Great ice ax
customer_reviews.text: Great ice ax. I've had mine for 2 years and it's still going strong. The paint on the adze/pick has worn off but the metal hasn't rusted or dulled. The included leash is handy to have and easily removable if you want to tie into your harness instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong and effective as hoped for. Not fond of the lanyards design.
customer_reviews.author: Struggling Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Summited Mt. Rainer, WA with it. I’m 5 9.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to help break the ice in water troughs ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help break the ice in water troughs, not the usual reason, I know. It actually worked well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Marilou Logan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Axe - would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but it feels sturdy - even though it was very light weight. The wrist strap is sturdy too. I am looking forward to using this on my winter expeditions. Seller shipped it very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Mardengar

customer_reviews.title: Camp Neve ice axe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice basic mountaineering axe. It is very light (not superlight) but feels substantial. The design is very similar to my Black Diamond Raven. The bonus is a small slider leash. Haven't used it yet but expect to like it just as much as the BD Raven. Mountain Gear is a top-notch seller. Wish they would give free shipping via Amazon, just as they do if you buy directly from them.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ryzhov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great ice axe for snow and glacier, at a very good price
customer_reviews.author: Simone Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, saved me a few times when climbing. Best product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Very good axe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good axe for the money. I have no complaints. Also, very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norman Aune

product_meta.title: Camp USA Neve Axe 80cm
product_meta.description: A sleek and elegant mountaineering axe with a forged steel pick designed to deliver solid placements in hard snow and provide quick and aggressive self arrests.
feature_bullets: Forged chromoly steel pick and adze
Carabiner holes at head and spike
